details.group_dynamic_select: SELECT distinct(system.id) FROM system WHERE system.os_family LIKE LOWER('redhat%') AND system.os_name LIKE LOWER('oracle%') AND system.status = 'production'
details.group_description: Any items that have their status attribute set to 'production' and have their os_family attribute set to 'RedHat' and the os_name contains 'Oracle'.
